WheelLog Unknown device Bluetooth LE is not supported Bluetooth is not supported on your device. Unable to initialize Bluetooth, exiting Bluetooth is required and was not successfully enabled. Direct connection failed. Searching for Wheel… Press BACK again to exit Scan Stop Connect Connecting Searching Disconnected Connected Connection Failed Disconnect Connect to Wheel Disconnect from Wheel Wheel Disconnected Connecting to Wheel… Searching for Wheel… Wheel Connected Waiting for device Start Pebble Dash Stop Pebble Dash Start Logging Stop Logging Enable Voice Messages Disable Voice Messages Started logging to %1$s Detected wheel protocol %1$s Search for Wheel Scanning… Devices Beginner Expert Normal Waiting for wheel… Speed Avg Speed Avg Riding Top Speed Battery Distance Wheel Distance User Distance Journey Time Ride Time Voltage Current Power System temp CPU(?) temp Tilt Roll Fan Status Mode Total Distance Total Name Model Version Serial Number %1$d%% • %2$d°C • %3$.1f km Watch Icon Logging Icon Connection Icon Voice Icon Connection lost at %1s No permission to write to external storage. Logging cancelled. External storage is unavailable. Logging cancelled. Log location was requested but no permission to location data was provided. No location data will be logged. Location logging using GPS was requested but GPS is disabled. Location will be logged using cellular network data. Location logging using cellular network was requested but this location provider is disabled. No location data will be logged. Location has been disabled within Android. No location data will be logged. Raw Distance Speed alarm triggered Current alarm triggered Temperature alarm triggered Live map requires permission to access location data. GPS is required for live map, but is not available. You are offline Waiting for GPS... You are live now! Last update at %1$s // PREFERENCES speed_preferences log_preferences alarm_preferences watch_preferences wheel_settings trip_settings speech_preferences speech_messages_preferences livemap_preferences // ALARM PREFERENCES alarms_enabled disable_phone_vibrate alarm_1_speed alarm_1_battery alarm_2_speed alarm_2_battery alarm_3_speed alarm_3_battery alarm_current alarm_temperature // WHEEL SETTINGS light_enabled led_enabled handle_button_disabled wheel_max_speed speaker_volume pedals_adjustment pedals_mode light_mode strobe_mode led_mode start_calibration alarm_mode gotway_84v gotway_voltage no_settings // LOG PREFERENCES auto_log auto_upload log_location_data use_gps // GENERAL PREFERENCES use_mi use_f max_speed use_ratio // WATCH PREFERENCES horn_mode // TRIP PREFERENCES reset_top_speed reset_user_distance last_mac about // LIVEMAP PREFERENCES livemap_api_key livemap_update_interval livemap_publish livemap_publication_delay livemap_start_new_segment // SPEECH PREFERENCES speech_messages speech_msg_rate speech_enable speech_rate speech_pitch speech_only_when_moving speech_msg_mode speech_enable_on_startup speech_messages_speed speech_messages_avg_speed speech_messages_distance speech_messages_battery speech_messages_phone_battery speech_messages_voltage speech_messages_current speech_messages_power speech_messages_temperature speech_messages_time speech_messages_time_from_start speech_messages_time_in_motion speech_messages_battery_low_level speech_messages_phone_battery_low_level speech_messages_distance_use_location speech_messages_weather Connected! General server error, try again later. Login failed, check your API key. You have to activate your account prior to use. Server access forbidden. Unknown error, try again later. Can\'t connect. Check your Internet connection and try again. Connecting... Weather conditions Available when live map is active Time in motion Time from start Temperature Current time Current speed Average speed Distance Battery level Phone battery level Voltage Current Power Warning messages Low battery Low phone battery Turn on voice messages on startup Speech rate Speech pitch Pause messages when not in motion Alarms and warnings are always active Triggering Interval Messages configuration Edit MAC address About WheelLog Reset user distance Reset top speed Wheel settings Watch preferences Voice settings Live map settings Alarm settings Log settings General settings Enable alarms Allow the phone to vibrate as a warning or enable voice alarms Disable phone vibration Phone will not vibrate but the alarm will be passed to a connected Pebble Watch Speed alarm - highest priority Speed Speed that triggers the alarm Battery percent Enable alarm when battery at or below this value Speed alarm - medium priority Speed Speed that triggers the alarm Battery percent Enable alarm when battery at or below this value Speed alarm - lowest priority Speed Speed that triggers the alarm Battery percent Enable alarm when battery at or below this value Current alarm Current Current that triggers the alarm Temperature alarm Temperature Temperature that triggers the alarm Speed and distance in miles Show speed and distance in miles rather than kilometers Temperature in degrees Fahrenheit Show temperature in degrees Fahrenheit rather than Celsius Max speed The maximum speed shown on the outer dial Light Mode Alarm Mode Alarm settings Pedals Mode Soft/Medium/Hard Wheel speed limit Tiltback speed, 0=disabled Calibration My Wheel is a Gotway MCM If your wheel is Gotway MCM, and it shows wrong speed, distance and others parameters, it should make them normal Battery voltage 67V/84V/100V Switch on the light Activate headlight Switch on wheel illumination Activate leds on the sides Disable handle button Wheel will not disable when you press the button on the handle Tiltback speed Speaker volume Change built-in speaker volume Pedals Horizontal pedals adjustment On/Off/Auto Strobe Mode On/Off Led Mode On/Off Tiltback speed API key Enter your API key to enable live map Update interval Select how often your location and wheel data are sent to the server and updated on the live map Start new segment instead of new tour Check if you want to continue latest tour instead of starting new one Tour visibility Define who can see your tour Publication delay You can delay publication of your live data from 5 minutes to 24 hours or make them available immediately Auto Log Start logging automatically when a wheel is connected Auto Upload Logs Automatically upload log files to Google Drive Log location Include location data within the logs Use GPS for location Use GPS for location rather than network provider. GPS is more accurate but may consume more battery power Wheel settings for Ninebot Z not available yet Reset Top Speed Reset User Distance Horn Mode Executed when the select button on the Pebble watch is pressed Welcome on board! Speed: %s. Average speed: %s. Distance: %s. Battery: %.0f%%. Phone battery: %d%%. Voltage: %.1f volts. Current: %.0f amperes. Power: %.0f watts. Temperature: %s. Time %s. %s from start. %s in motion. Weather. Temperature: %s. Temperature: %s, feels like %s. Low battery! Low phone battery! Connected. Connection lost. Current! Too high! Temperature! Too high! Slow down! Slow down! Slow down! About WheelLog Version %s built at %s
by Sebastian Łastowski sebastian@euc.world

Hey, are you interested in using live map feature? Learn more and register for free at https://euc.world MAC Edit OK Cancel Wheel Password ( InMotion only ) Speed Settings Enable Auto Upload? Automatic uploading while not connected to WiFi will use your mobile data. This may result in charges from your network provider if you do not have a data plan. Settings Link to my tour map Share your tour Live map Off On %d min %d hr %d hr and %d min show_when_locked Show when locked Show main window even if the screen is locked Temporary server error. Please try again later. Error when preparing image for upload Image upload failed Image uploaded! Uploading image...
